statements.select: SELECT * FROM AcInvoiceXOBill WHERE AcInvoiceXOBillDate BETWEEN #StartDate# AND #EndDate#
statements.update: UPDATE AcInvoiceXOBill SET mHeXiaoJingE = #HeXiao# WHERE AcInvoiceXOBill.AcInvoiceXOBillId = #AcInvoiceXOBillId#
statements.select: select top 1 AcInvoiceXOBillDate from AcInvoiceXOBill where InsertTime<#value# order by InsertTime desc
